format: shell script / Python mixed with configuration code
description: This file defines and manages MicroBlaze processor version features, conflicts, and version-specific configurations for a build system. It includes functions to determine the current version, mappings of valid versions, conflict lists, and build flags related to versioning.

methods.name: microblaze_current_version
methods.description: Determines the current MicroBlaze version based on TUNE_FEATURES variable and formats it according to specified parameters.
